mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that all images are optimized for mobile to reduce loading time and improve responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce heavy scripts to speed up page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO with more relevant keywords in headings and meta descriptions.
userExperienceTip: Consider adding a sticky navigation bar for easier access to essential pages while scrolling.
bookingFlowTip: Make the booking form more user-friendly by reducing the number of steps and providing clearer instructions.
tips: Add structured data for better SEO
